form.help: The contact form fields marked with the asterisk are mandatory (name and last name, e-mail, subject, message, data processing, reCAPTCHA.
form.error400: Oops, server has adjudicated, that data is incorrect and has refused to send the message. Please, try once more.
form.error500: Oops, despite the best will server could not send the message. Please, try once more.
form.errorUnknown: Oops, for the reasons not clearly specified sending the message has failed. Please, try once more.
success: Thank you very much for sending the message!
Customer service will answer as soon as possible ;-)

name.label: Name and last name
info: Please use min 3 and max 32 characters.

email.label: E-mail
info: The format of e-mail is local-part@mailboxdomain

message.label: Message
info: Please use min 5 and max 2000 characters.

rodo.label: I've read <1>{{value}}</1> and I accept it.
rodo.error: Consent to data processing is essential so that I can respond to your message.
info: By sending a message I am aware that the data provided will be processed by Mr. Aleksander Fret for correspondence.

I know that I can request deleting or changing my personal data. I remember that these rights result from the General Regulation on the protection of personal data (EU 2016/679). I know that I have the right to complain to the President of the Office for Personal Data Protection under the Personal Data Protection Act (Journal of Laws 2018 item 1000).
I acknowledge that the data will be processed by kylos.pl an e-mail service provider.
